description.src: A string containing a valid URL or an ImageInterface object. If the object is used, the srcset attribute is ignored.
description.caption: Image caption
description.title: Title of the image
description.fullWidth: If the image should be full width
description.cover: If the image should cover the container
description.rounded: Border radius of the image, false for no radius. Accepted values are xs, sm, md, lg, full
description.openModal: If the image should be able to open in a modal
description.placeholderText: Label to show if image is missing
description.placeholderIcon: Icon to display if image is missing / false to hide
description.placeholderIconSize: Icons size, please refer to image component for size.
description.removeCaption: Shows only the alt-text removing the image caption and byline
